channel.title: Daily News Feed Update #1
channel.description: Daily collected titles from multiple sources

item.title: Bangla Editorials (Update #1) • সাংবাদিকতা বিষয়ে পড়াশোনা কি ‘গ্ল্যামার’ হারাচ্ছে?

Magazines (Update #1) • The Confusion Over Antidepressants During Pregnancy Is Harming People • New Study Finds Annual COVID Vaccines Protect People against Severe Disease, Even with Prior Immunity • This Year’s Nobel Physics Prize Showed Quantum Mechanics Is a Big Deal—Literally • Will AI Ever Win a Nobel Prize? • After 30 Years of Discovery, These Are Astronomers’ Top Five Exoplanets • Why Scammers Target Seniors—And What You Can Do About It • 2025 Chemistry Nobel Goes to Molecular Sponges That Purify Water, Store Energy and Clean Up the Environment • AI Scans Tongue Color to Predict Diseases • Astronaut Chris Hadfield Explores Cold War Geopolitics in New Novel • Electrons inside graphene have been pushed to supersonic speeds • Memory chips just 10 atoms thick could vastly increase capacity • The moon's largest crater didn't form in the way we thought • Selfish sperm see older fathers pass on more disease-causing mutations • Why everything you thought you knew about your immune system is wrong • Nobel prize in chemistry awarded for work on molecular architecture

International (Update #1) • Cristina Fernández de Kirchner: Argentinian court sentences man to 10 years for attempted assassination • Senate Republicans vote against check on Trump using deadly force against cartels • Jamaica imposes local curfews after two deadly shootings rattle the island • Illegal gold mining clears 140,000 hectares of Peruvian Amazon • Ecuador’s president unharmed after protesters attack his motorcade • ‘Humanitarian’ visa must be created for Pacific Islanders displaced by climate crisis, experts say • UK plastic waste exports to developing countries rose 84% in a year, data shows • Australia politics live: Google blocked ads for government-funded STI campaign; PM welcomes Gaza peace deal announcement • 4chan unlikely to be included in Australia’s under-16s social media ban, eSafety commissioner says • Former UFC fighter gunned down while out for an evening walk in Sydney • Erin Patterson should never be released over mushroom murders, prosecutors tell sentence appeal • University of Melbourne rated best in Australia in global rankings report • Germany ends fast-track citizenship as mood on migration shifts • Spanish MPs back move to enshrine in law arms embargo on Israel • ‘Veggie burgers’ could be off EU menu as MEPs back renaming plant-based foods • Outgoing French PM says ‘path still exists’ to avoid snap elections • Drone dilemma: How Russia’s ‘hybrid war’ is using fear to destabilise Europe • Gaza ceasefire live: Israel ‘preparing to receive’ hostages as Trump says he will be ’involved’ in keeping peace • A Gaza ceasefire deal could be Trump’s biggest diplomatic achievement – but the devil is in the detail • ‘First phase’ of ceasefire deal to end war in Gaza agreed by Israel and Hamas • Almost 55,000 children in Gaza acutely malnourished, Lancet study estimates • Trump says Gaza peace deal ‘very close’ and he may travel to Middle East in days • Keir Starmer to look at India’s digital ID system during visit to Mumbai • Paraglider bomb attack by Myanmar military kills at least 20 at protest • Wife of synagogue terrorist says he showed no signs of extremism • UK Treasury tells ministers not to expect bailouts from its reserve fund • NHS could pay 25% more for medicines under plan to end row with drugmakers and Trump • Pubs to stay open until early hours in push for UK growth • Badenoch sets out her vision to redefine Tory party – but few are listening • Republican lawmakers praise Trump for Gaza deal as Palestinian Americans remain wary: ‘So much remains unclear’ • White House gives platform to conservative influencers to air grievances during ‘antifa roundtable’ – as it happened • Man charged with starting Palisades fire that killed 12 people • Trump to visit Walter Reed for ‘routine yearly checkup’, the second since April • Marco Rubio interrupts Trump with handwritten note on Gaza peace deal
